UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A novel antifungal peptide from leaves of the weed Stellaria media L.
Literature.Author: Rogozhin EA, Slezina MP, Slavokhotova AA, Istomina EA, Korostyleva TV, Smirnov AN, Grishin EV, Egorov TA, Odintsova TI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Botrytis cinerea SGR-1(IC50=2.4µM),Fusarium solani IVK(IC50=3.5µM),Alternaria alternata DVZ(IC50=2.6µM)
